galaxy.summary: MetaEuk is a modular toolkit designed for large-scale gene discovery andannotation in eukaryotic metagenomic contigs. Metaeuk combines the fast andsensitive homology search capabilities of MMseqs2 with a dynamic programmingprocedure to recover optimal exons sets. It reduces redundancies in multiplediscoveries of the same gene and resolves conflicting gene predictions onthe same strand.
